name: We Play Tanks! Tanks!
description:
A Reimagining of the Wii Play Tanks Mini game built for PC. All new mouse and keyboard controls implemented. Future updates to come in the near future

This project was made for educational purposes.

This project was made in collaboration with the CPP Game Development Club.

Credits of the Game go to: Andrew K., Brandon H., Jonah M., Joshua H., Laurence G., Patrick S., Solomon M.
